title: Gambling Week: Awards Picks for MVP, DPOY, OROY, DROY with Whale Capper (Football 9/3)
description:
In a season of uncertainty, you might get your most value betting on awards futures. To help us breakdown value picks, the great Drew Dinsick aka Whale Capper joins Will Brinson to discuss MVP, Defensive Player of the Year as well as Rookie of the Year on both sides of the ball. First, the big one...The DNA for MVPs is simply: QBs that can win a lot of games (12:15). Who fits that mold and has reasonable odds? Next up, DPOY (34:00). We're looking for raw numbers and narrative here. Lastly, Rookie of the Year picks might be a little more obvious looking at the top of the board (47:15).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @whale_capper, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
